name: Presence
description: You modify your presence causing the attention of creatures within a very short (5 unit) radius becoming magically drawn to you. While you concentrate on this spell, any creature within the range of your spell must make a resilience check of 4 at the start of their turn. On a failure, their attack checks have a penalty dice against anyone other than you if they remain in your spell.
charge: The resilience check required is increased to 6.
